name: 3D School Bus Driver Simulator
description:
Trucker Studios brings the latest simulation game with animated realistic graphics and racing fun. Drive around the city in traffic and get a chance to be a real bus driver. You can speed up your bus in city traffic and have some fun racing. With realistic simulator game and awesome 3D graphics, this will always keep you entertained since there is traffic in the city and you have to be careful and avoid any accidents. Don’t drive the bus like a sports car and don’t hit anything in the city otherwise your bus can get damaged and cause trouble. So get this awesome Bus Simulator game right now and start having some city racing fun!

Features:
- Realistic 3D Graphics
- Awesome driving fun in the city
- Detailed interior
- Lots of buses to choose from
- Animated people and traffic
